hooks.prompt: Check if the file that was just edited/written matches a source path tracked by agent-sync. Look for tools/agent-sync/sources.json or .agent-sync/sources.json in the project root. If the config exists, check if the edited file path matches any value in the "files" object. If it matches, output EXACTLY: '[agent-sync] Source file changed. Run /agent-sync:generate to update AGENTS.md.' If no config exists or the file doesn't match, output nothing.
